home.Title: Grandpa Tihon
home.Subtitle: A bot that sends incomprehensible crap into a conversation, and even randomly. From the village, what to say.
home.UsageText2: He will accept the request within an hour, and after that you will be able to invite him into the conversation or immediately start using the commands in personal messages.

FAQ1.title: What is this Tikhon Russkov?
FAQ1.text: Tikhon is a hero from the cartoon "Three Heroes ", an old grandfather and just a crazy Christian.

FAQ2.title: How to start? What does a bot do?
FAQ2.text: I (the developer) gave Tihon a more humane look and therefore the bot starts whenever he wants. Have respect for elders! A list of commands can be viewed on the site.

FAQ3.title: I do not respect Tikhon. Where can I fill his snout?
FAQ3.text: You will talk with him before God, Judas.
